metadata.name: DEVTA
metadata.description:
"Devta means God."

This illustration was made as a therapy session to keep my sanity and the creativity flowing at the same time. 

In 2020, I spent a lot of time drawing and producing art. It was calm and therapeutic. Most of the artworks were produced without any preliminary sketches or Ideas. 

Everything came naturally. And I can feel that God was guiding me through all along.

This Artwork has been featured in the illustrator Draw Gallery.

Size : 13780 × 7009
